title: FS/FT: T-206 Joss Portrait Vg+ to Vg/ex
author: Angyale

posts.post_title: FS/FT: T-206 Joss Portrait Vg+ to Vg/ex
posts.post_content:
Card will grade at least a PSA 3 or your money back so long as card is returned in same condition as sent.  Compare it to the 3's (and the asking prices) currently on Ebay.  It is more likely a 3.5 or a 4.  Will consider trades for other items I need.  Thanks for looking.  References available upon request.  Card is no longer available.  Thanks.

Eric
